ValidationRule.description: Once a PSR is Completed or Cancelled, the record becomes locked from further editing.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( OR( ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE ( Status__c), "Complete"), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE ( Status__c), "Cancelled") ), ISCHANGED( Status__c),
NOT ( $Profile.Name= "Group Business Solutions"), NOT ( $Profile.Name= "System Administrator") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage:
You are not allowed to edit a Closed Pre Sales Request.
Please create a new request.
